comments:
In the UI section of the instrument collector if a user tries to add a new filter set the following error is occurs:

org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Content is not allowed in prolog.
	at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.DOMParser.parse(DOMParser.java:264)
	at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(DocumentBuilderImpl.java:292)
	at javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder.parse(DocumentBuilder.java:98)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.ui.internal.util.XMLUtil.loadDom(XMLUtil.java:167)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.ui.internal.util.XMLUtil.loadDom(XMLUtil.java:210)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.instrumentation.ui.internal.configuration.InstrumentFiltersUI.showWSetDialog(InstrumentFiltersUI.java:1326)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.instrumentation.ui.internal.configuration.InstrumentFiltersUI.widgetSelected(InstrumentFiltersUI.java:1058)

The problem is that the default filter set is not correct.
Changed default filter set to point to the correct filter type.

traces.message: Content is not allowed in prolog.
